com.alexkasko.unsafe.offheaplong

Class OffHeapLongBinarySearch

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.alexkasko.unsafe.offheaplong.OffHeapLongBinarySearch

  • public class OffHeapLongBinarySearch
extends Object
    Binary search implementation borrowed from https://android.googlesource.com/platform/libcore/+/android-4.2.2_r1/luni/src/main/java/java/util/Arrays.java and adapted to OffHeapAddressable
    Author:
    alexkasko Date: 3/5/13
    See Also:
    OffHeapLongSorter

      OffHeapAddressable index range representation.

    • Constructor Detail

      • OffHeapLongBinarySearch

    • Method Detail

      • binarySearch

        public static long binarySearch(OffHeapAddressable collection,
                long value)
        Performs a binary search for value in the ascending sorted off-heap collection. Searching in an unsorted collection has an undefined result. It's also undefined which element is found if there are multiple occurrences of the same element.
        Parameters:
        collection - the sorted array to search.
        value - the element to find.
        Returns:
        the non-negative index of the element, or a negative index which is -index - 1 where the element would be inserted.

      • binarySearch

        public static long binarySearch(OffHeapAddressable collection,
                long startIndex,
                long endIndex,
                long value)
        Performs a binary search for value in the ascending sorted off-heap collection, in the range specified by fromIndex (inclusive) and toIndex (exclusive). Searching in an unsorted collection has an undefined result. It's also undefined which element is found if there are multiple occurrences of the same element.
        Parameters:
        collection - the sorted collection to search.
        startIndex - the inclusive start index.
        endIndex - the exclusive end index.
        value - the element to find.
        Returns:
        the non-negative index of the element, or a negative index which is -index - 1 where the element would be inserted.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if (startIndex < 0 || startIndex > endIndex || endIndex > collection.size()

      • binarySearchRange

        public static void binarySearchRange(OffHeapAddressable collection,
                     long value,
                     OffHeapLongBinarySearch.IndexRange out)
        Performs a binary search for value in the ascending sorted off-heap collection. Returns range of indices having given value or empty range. Searching in an unsorted collection has an undefined result. It's also undefined which element is found if there are multiple occurrences of the same element.
        Parameters:
        collection - the sorted array to search.
        value - the element to find.
        out - range instance, will be set with start/end indices having given value or with empty value

      • binarySearchRange

        public static void binarySearchRange(OffHeapAddressable collection,
                     long startIndex,
                     long endIndex,
                     long value,
                     OffHeapLongBinarySearch.IndexRange out)
        Performs a binary search for value in the ascending sorted off-heap collection. Returns range of indices having given value or empty range. Searching in an unsorted collection has an undefined result. It's also undefined which element is found if there are multiple occurrences of the same element.
        Parameters:
        collection - the sorted array to search.
        startIndex - the inclusive start index.
        endIndex - the exclusive end index.
        value - the element to find.
        out - range instance, will be set with start/end indices having given value or with empty value
